Uses of Class
org.securecryptoconfig.PlaintextContainer

  • Packages that use PlaintextContainer 
    Package Description
    org.securecryptoconfig
    The Secure Crypto Config Interface provides methods for the most common cryptographic use cases: Symmetric encryption, Asymmetric encryption, hashing, password hashing and Signing.

    • Uses of PlaintextContainer in org.securecryptoconfig

      Methods in org.securecryptoconfig that return PlaintextContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      PlaintextContainer SCCCiphertext.decryptAsymmetric​(org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key)
      Asymmetric decryption with a certain SCCKey of SCCCiphertext.
      PlaintextContainer SecureCryptoConfig.decryptAsymmetric​(org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key, org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)
      Asymmetric decryption with a certain SCCKey for a given SCCCiphertext.
      PlaintextContainer SCCCiphertext.decryptSymmetric​(org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key)
      Symmetric decryption with a certain SCCKey of SCCCiphertext.
      PlaintextContainer SecureCryptoConfig.decryptSymmetric​(org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key, org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCCiphertext sccciphertext)
      Decryption of a given SCCCiphertext.
      Methods in org.securecryptoconfig with parameters of type PlaintextContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected static SCCHash SecureCryptoConfig.createHashMessage​(PlaintextContainer plaintext, AlgorithmID id)
      Creation of COSE HashMessage for hashing.
      static SCCKey SCCKey.createSymmetricKeyWithPassword​(PlaintextContainer password)
      Creation of key derived from a given password that can be used for symmetric encryption based on Secure Crypto Config file.
